panels.description:
* `num jrubies`: number of JRuby instances (constant)
* `num free jrubies`: number of JRuby instances free
* `average free jrubies`: average free JRubies over time
* `average requested jrubies`: average requested JRubies over time
panels.title: JRuby Usage

panels.description:
* `borrow time`: average time a JRuby is borrowed for
* `wait time`: average time Puppet Server spends waiting to borrow a JRuby to service a request
* `lock held time`: average time the lock on the JRuby pool is held
* `lock wait time`: average time Puppet Server spends waiting to acquire the lock
panels.title: JRuby Pool Timers

panels.description: Heap and non-heap memory used, number of cpus available.
panels.title: JVM metrics

panels.description: Average request time by type - time the server spends serving each type of request, including time waiting to acquire a JRuby
panels.title: Request Durations

panels.description:
Time spent in different parts of handling a Catalog request

* `compile`: time to compile catalogs.
* `static_compile`: time to do a static compile of catalogs.
* `static compile postprocessing`: time to do postprocessing of static catalog, including inlining file metadata.
* `function calls`: time spent calling functions (included in `compile` time)
* `find_node`: time to get node object (not included in `compile` time)
* `find_facts`: time to parse facts sent as part of catalog request (not included in `compile` time)
panels.title: Compilation

panels.description:
Time to make HTTP requests to other services

* `PuppetDB: replace facts`: time to send a "facts replace" command to PuppetDB (part of a catalog compile)
* `PuppetDB: replace catalog`: time to send a "catalog replace" command to PuppetDB (part of a catalog compile)
* `PuppetDB: store report`: time to send a "report store" command to PuppetDB (part of handling a report request)
* `PuppetDB: find facts`: time to get facts from PuppetDB (part of a node and catalog request, if the facts for the node are not cached)
* `PuppetDB: search resources`: time to get exported resources from PuppetDB (part of a catalog compile if exported resources are used)
*`PuppetDB: query`: time to execute a PuppetDB query (part of a catalog compile if the puppetdb query function is used)
* `Http report processor`: time to submit a report to the http report url (if the http report processor is used)
* `Classifier: find node`: time to get a node's classification from the Classifier
panels.title: External HTTP Communications

panels.description: Percentage of requests handled of each type.
panels.title: Request Ratios

panels.description: Number of active requests and average number of active requests (over ~ 5 minutes).
panels.title: Active Requests

panels.description:
* `commit`: Time for storage service to commit code in code-staging
* `client clone`: Time for client to do initial clone of environments from storage service.
* `client fetch`: Time for client to do subsequent fetches from storage service.
* `client sync`: Time for client to sync code from datadir to codedir (during which time it holds a lock on the JRuby pool).
panels.title: File Sync
